I will as soon as I can. I'm working on a feature that all ye people 
should like very much, and its taking quite a bunch of time.

And you're welcome for the idea. I'm sure you would have thought of 
it anyways :-)

::Neody/The Lavacons::

Neody nods, looking to Cygnar and waiting for him to say something.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Unknown to Astral, his nod was at the exact same second as Neody's.

"Sounds good to me. Lets get started then."

His troops get some materials, beginning the construction of the 
repair station.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> OOC: Please add the new Destron base to the events page, Zardus.  
Its in 
> Syria.
> 
> :::Ramjet/Wheeljack/Vulois/Time Warp:::
> 
> Ramjet: The one extremely close to us belongs to the Trainers.  
They are led 
> by a bot named Prebon.  They are powerful, and are enemies of the 
Maximals 
> and Alliance.  The other one is the Blackfortress, the base a large 
faction 
> of Predacons.  There are three Predacon leaders there, and i think 
we might 
> be able to work out an Alliance with them.
> ~~~~~
> Wheeljack: I'd say a sloping, hill-type shape.(Thanks for the idea 
Zardus!)
> ~~~~~
> Vulois: Yes, lets. I think we should first go to the Maximals, for 
they will 
> be the most likely to cooperate.  Even so, there are a lot of 
warlike 
> Maximals, so be ready for anything.
> ::he walks out of his cave and starts flying to the CF::
> ~~~~~
> ::Time Warp was releived that they were friends, until he heard 
what they 
> said about Infectra::
> Time Warp: Infectra?! In the Alliance?! I didnt know her very well, 
but she 
> definately wasnt Alliance material!  Lets get out of here 
Airbomber, these 
> guys are fools.
